thread.title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare To Extend "Lock-Up" Period Of Shares Until July 31

title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare To Extend "Lock-Up" Period Of Shares Until July 31
text: February 16, 2018 / 2:41 PM / Updated 29 minutes ago BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare To Extend "Lock-Up" Period Of Shares Until July 31 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Genesis Healthcare Inc: * GENESIS HEALTHCARE- ON FEB 15, HOLDERS OF MAJORITY OF VOTING POWER OF COâ€˜S COMMON STOCK ENTERED INTO FOURTH AMENDED & RESTATED VOTING AGREEMENT * GENESIS HEALTHCARE SAYS PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT, MEMBERS OF VOTING GROUP TO EXTEND "LOCK-UP" PERIOD OF SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK UNTIL JULY 31, 2018 Source: ( bit.ly/2F7GgVb ) Further company coverage:
